Help and Support

Hello

Kinopio is the thinking, diagramming, and planning tool for your hardest problems.

By making it easy to get your thoughts out and form connections organically, Kinopio works how our brains work.

If you have questions, comments, or requests, please don't hesitate to reach out to hi@kinopio.club. Or on Twitter, or Are.na.
